actions.text: Committee on Commerce ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Commerce reported an original measure. With written report No. 97-43.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 54.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original bill to amend the National Climate Program Act to extend the appropriations for authorizations for fiscal year 1982, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the National Climate Program Act to require the Secretary of Commerce to submit the annual report to the President and the authorizing committees of Congress by March 1 rather than by January 30 of each fiscal year. Authorizes appropriations to carry out the purposes of such Act for fiscal year 1982.

titles.title: An original bill to amend the National Climate Program Act to extend the appropriations for authorizations for fiscal year 1982, and for other purposes.
